item.title: Attacking Active Directory - Part 1 - Reconnaissance
item.description:
Hey everyone! It’s been a while since my last post.

This time, Iâ€™m kicking off a new series that will serve as both a practice guide and a follow-up to the GOAD WriteUp. We’ll go from reconnaissance all the way to gaining control and analyzing an Active Directory (AD) infrastructure. Iâ€™ll mostly follow the same route but with some tweaks to reflect changes and sprinkle in some real-life experience from my work. I wonâ€™t go super deep into the technical detailsâ€”otherwise, Iâ€™d end up writing a book (or two! ðŸ˜„)â€”but Iâ€™ll include helpful resources if you want to dive deeper. And as always, the comments section is open! My goal here is to explain technical concepts in a clear and friendly way so that even beginners can follow along and learn.
